name: Bleed 4 Them
description:
! PLEASE READ THE DESCRIPTION BEFORE PLAYING !

We recommand playing the ZIP version for a better experience.

How to play :
Move : WASD or Arrow keys
Shoot : Left click
Reload : R
Interract with Altar and exit : Press E

Your goal is to save the highest possible number of follower. End a level with a follower alive to save him.  If it's too hard you can take the risk to sacrifice someone for getting a buff and save even more people. Or maybe you will plan to sacrifice them all to become stronger,  It only depends of your actions. 
The game will restart if your character dies.

Don't hesitate to share your score once you've finished the game ! Will you be able to save them all ?

The team :
Game artist : https://flucx.itch.io/
Sound designer :  https://pougrivioure.itch.io/
Programmer :  https://thevincent.itch.io/
Game & Level designer : https://cybertoasty.itch.io/

External credits :
Font used : Gunkie | FontStruct
